name: Double Drop Piece
descr:
Originally designed as a teaching/learning aid for adjusting technique classes at Palmer College, this versatile drop piece is also widely used as an extremity drop piece. The teaching/learning aid (Speeder Board) has a simulated high transverse process in the form of a raised "bump" under the cushion. The extremity drop piece version has a flat surface without the "bump". Both versions have adjustable tension control. It is intended to be used as an extremity drop piece and not as a cervical drop piece.

Specifications: 21x15x9 cm.

Available as standard in black and other colours available of extra charge and time of delivery.
